title: What are the best high school marching bands? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fist ones that come to mind for me would be Broken Arrow, Vandegrift, Vista Ridge, Flower Mound, and pretty much all of the rest of the marching bands around the Austin, Texas area. Don’t get me wrong, there are other amazing high school bands in California and Florida, but around Texas and Oklahoma those are the really good ones. Puts my 5A ragtag band to shame.

I’m not much into bands anymore but many years ago I was a member of a drum and bugle corp. I think their talent in competitions far outweighs any marching band hands down. That said, any band that does the big parades would be right up there. Rose Bowl, Macy’s, etc. That is not to say that there are not great marching bands at many local high schools, because there are some fantastic ones.
